question: Show the list of flights, their aircraft families, source and destination airports with their departure date and times and order the list by date and time.
sql_query1:
SELECT
Flights.flight_number,
Planes.manufacturer_name,
Source.name, 
Dest.name,
Flights.departure_date,
Flights.scheduled_departure_time
FROM Flights
JOIN Planes ON Planes.id = Flights.plane_id
JOIN Routes ON Routes.id = Flights.route_id
JOIN Airports AS Source ON Source.id = Routes.source_airport_id
JOIN Airports AS Dest ON Dest.id = Routes.destination_airport_id
ORDER BY Flights.departure_date ASC, Flights.scheduled_departure_time ASC
sql_query2:
SELECT
Flights.flight_number,
Planes.model_name,
Source.name, 
Dest.name,
Flights.departure_date,
Flights.scheduled_departure_time
FROM Flights
JOIN Planes ON Planes.id = Flights.plane_id
JOIN Routes ON Routes.id = Flights.route_id
JOIN Airports AS Source ON Source.id = Routes.source_airport_id
JOIN Airports AS Dest ON Dest.id = Routes.destination_airport_id
ORDER BY Flights.departure_date ASC, Flights.scheduled_departure_time ASC
sql_query3:
SELECT
Flights.flight_number,
Planes.manufacturer_name, model_name,
Source.name, 
Dest.name,
Flights.departure_date,
Flights.scheduled_departure_time
FROM Flights
JOIN Planes ON Planes.id = Flights.plane_id
JOIN Routes ON Routes.id = Flights.route_id
JOIN Airports AS Source ON Source.id = Routes.source_airport_id
JOIN Airports AS Dest ON Dest.id = Routes.destination_airport_id
ORDER BY Flights.departure_date ASC, Flights.scheduled_departure_time ASC
interpretation1: Show the list of flights, their plane manufacturers, source and destination airports with their departure date and times and order the list by date and time.
interpretation2: Show the list of flights, their plane models, source and destination airports with their departure date and times and order the list by date and time.
interpretation3: Show the list of flights, their plane manufacturers and models, source and destination airports with their departure date and times and order the list by date and time.
sql_query_general:
SELECT
Flights.flight_number,
Planes.Aircraft_Family,
Source.name, 
Dest.name,
Flights.departure_date,
Flights.scheduled_departure_time
FROM Flights
JOIN Planes ON Planes.id = Flights.plane_id
JOIN Routes ON Routes.id = Flights.route_id
JOIN Airports AS Source ON Source.id = Routes.source_airport_id
JOIN Airports AS Dest ON Dest.id = Routes.destination_airport_id
ORDER BY Flights.departure_date ASC, Flights.scheduled_departure_time ASC

question: List the flights with the corresponding airlines, aircraft families and pilots assigned to the flights.
sql_query1:
SELECT 
Flights.flight_number,
Airlines.airline_name,
Planes.manufacturer_name,
Pilots.full_name
FROM Flights
JOIN Routes ON Routes.id = Flights.route_id
JOIN Planes ON Planes.id = Flights.plane_id
JOIN AssignsPilotToFlight APTF ON APTF.flight_id = Flights.id
JOIN Pilots ON Pilots.id = APTF.pilot_id
JOIN Airlines ON Airlines.id = Routes.airline_id
sql_query2:
SELECT 
Flights.flight_number,
Airlines.airline_name,
Planes.model_name,
Pilots.full_name
FROM Flights
JOIN Routes ON Routes.id = Flights.route_id
JOIN Planes ON Planes.id = Flights.plane_id
JOIN AssignsPilotToFlight APTF ON APTF.flight_id = Flights.id
JOIN Pilots ON Pilots.id = APTF.pilot_id
JOIN Airlines ON Airlines.id = Routes.airline_id
sql_query3:
SELECT 
Flights.flight_number,
Airlines.airline_name,
Planes.manufacturer_name, model_name,
Pilots.full_name
FROM Flights
JOIN Routes ON Routes.id = Flights.route_id
JOIN Planes ON Planes.id = Flights.plane_id
JOIN AssignsPilotToFlight APTF ON APTF.flight_id = Flights.id
JOIN Pilots ON Pilots.id = APTF.pilot_id
JOIN Airlines ON Airlines.id = Routes.airline_id
interpretation1: List the flights, their corresponding airlines, manufacturers and their assigned pilots.
interpretation2: List the flights, their corresponding airlines, model names and their assigned pilots.
interpretation3: List the flights, their corresponding airlines, manufacturers, model names and assigned pilots.
sql_query_general:
SELECT 
Flights.flight_number,
Airlines.airline_name,
Planes.Aircraft_Family,
Pilots.full_name
FROM Flights
JOIN Routes ON Routes.id = Flights.route_id
JOIN Planes ON Planes.id = Flights.plane_id
JOIN AssignsPilotToFlight APTF ON APTF.flight_id = Flights.id
JOIN Pilots ON Pilots.id = APTF.pilot_id
JOIN Airlines ON Airlines.id = Routes.airline_id
